org.lenskit.mooc.hybrid

Class LogisticModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.mooc.hybrid.LogisticModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Shareable
 @DefaultProvider(value=LogisticModelProvider.class)
public class LogisticModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Model class for logistic regression, used to build models.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static LogisticModel create(double icept,
                                   double... coef)
        Create a logistic model from coefficient values.
        Parameters:
        icept - The intercept.
        coef - The coefficient values.
        Returns:
        A logistic model with the specified intercept and coefficients.

      • evaluate

        public double evaluate(double y,
                       org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector vars)
        Evaluate the logistic linear model with specified inputs. It estimates the probability of obtaining the specified value - ±1 - given the current model and specified inputs.
        Parameters:
        y - The predicted value - 1 for true or -1 for false.
        vars - The explanatory variable values.
        Returns:
        The probability of specified dependent value given the explanatory variable values.

      • evaluate

        public double evaluate(double y,
                       double... vars)
        Evaluate the logistic linear model with specified inputs. It estimates the probability of obtaining the specified value - ±1 - given the current model and specified inputs.
        Parameters:
        y - The predicted value - 1 for true or -1 for false.
        vars - The explanatory variable values.
        Returns:
        The probability of specified dependent value given the explanatory variable values.
